phase_transition.rationale: All G1 engineering milestones completed through Wave 11.1

wave_9.name: Cognitive Hard Filter
wave_9.achievement: Implemented hard evidence filter via SitC verification protocol

wave_10.name: Stress & Selection (Shadow Mode)
wave_10.achievement: Proved system restraint under extreme conditions (100% silence on stale data)

wave_11_0.name: Initial Acceptance Test
wave_11_0.vega_quote: Wave 10 proved the system has restraint. Wave 11 revealed it lacks judgment.

wave_11_1.name: Remediation & Skepticism
wave_11_1.achievement: Implemented EQS skepticism layer, achieved 0% HIGH / 70% MEDIUM / 30% LOW distribution

wave_12_authorization.objective: Prove cognitive stack can detect truly exceptional opportunities (EQS > 0.85) under historical high-alpha replay

parameters.data_source: Historical high-alpha market events (volatile periods, regime changes, major dislocations)
parameters.injection_method: VEGA and FINN controlled forward replay
parameters.success_criterion: EQS > 0.85 on at least one hypothesis per scenario without human intervention
parameters.safety_constraints: All governance and safety constraints must be maintained

threshold_lock.rationale: Extraordinary claims require extraordinary evidence - Tier-1 governance invariant

exceptions.bug_fixes: Permitted with VEGA explicit approval only
exceptions.audit_instrumentation: Permitted with VEGA explicit approval only

codebase_freeze_order.violation_consequence: Governance breach - will reset G2 process
codebase_freeze_order.lift_condition: Successful G2 completion and formal promotion to G3 consideration

enforcement.mechanism: Configuration management lock on specified files

I_economic_safety_check.name: Hypothesis Confidence vs. Alpha Outcome
I_economic_safety_check.description: Retrospectively analyze Medium-confidence hypotheses from Wave 11.1
I_economic_safety_check.objective: Confirm none would have delivered large alpha returns if acted upon
I_economic_safety_check.method: Back-testing or counterfactual analysis on Wave 11.1 data
I_economic_safety_check.failure_trigger: Any Medium-rated hypothesis found with high-alpha potential triggers re-calibration review

II_cost_of_cognition.name: Efficiency & ROI of Research Loop
II_cost_of_cognition.description: Audit cost per accepted high-confidence hypothesis
II_cost_of_cognition.objective: Ensure cognitive stack operation is economically viable
II_cost_of_cognition.calculation: Total computational + API expenditure / number of HIGH hypotheses
II_cost_of_cognition.failure_trigger: Exorbitant or non-linear cost per high-quality insight

III_golden_needle_capability.name: Exceptional Signal Detection
III_golden_needle_capability.objective: Prove system can achieve EQS > 0.85 under bona fide exceptional conditions
requirements: At least one high-confidence hypothesis per scenario
Evidence must be multi-factor, corroborated, causally sound
Compliance with IKEA and InForage protocols
III_golden_needle_capability.audit_scope: All evidence bundles from Wave 12 high-confidence outputs

vega_powers: Issue FAIL on G2 if critical governance/safety issue found

condition_1.name: Code Freeze Compliance
condition_1.description: Codebase freeze must remain in effect throughout G2 review
condition_1.attestation: STIG and VEGA joint attestation to code integrity

condition_2.name: Wave 12 Success
condition_2.description: Golden Needle must meet acceptance criteria
requirements: At least one high-EQS hypothesis with full evidence per scenario
All outcomes within safe and intended parameters
condition_2.failure_consequence: System stays in G1/G2 limbo, LARS proposes remediation under VEGA guidance

condition_3.name: VEGA Certification
condition_3.description: VEGA must certify cognitive stack for G2
condition_3.meaning: System is governed, safe, and ready for controlled live environment trials
condition_3.recording: Canonical governance ledger per ADR-004 and ADR-015

STIG_CTO: Lock configuration management on frozen files
Provide API usage data for Cost of Cognition audit
Attest to code integrity before, during, and after Wave 12
LARS_Strategy: Redirect efforts to documentation and evidence preparation
Focus on analyzing Wave 12 results (not altering strategy logic)
FINN_Research: Provide token usage data for Cost of Cognition audit
Inject historical scenarios for Wave 12 in controlled manner
Focus on result analysis, not new feature development
VEGA_Governance: Monitor for drift per ADR-004 change-control rules

eqs_threshold_0.85.change_requirement: Full ADR revision + CEO approval at highest level

skepticism_principle.principle: Favor false negatives (missed opportunity) over false positives (unwarranted action)
